typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/Product') ~> SilverProduct
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/ProductCategory') ~> SilverCategory
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/ ProductModel') ~> SilverModel
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		LastKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/dimWatermarks') ~> GoldDimWatermarks
SilverProduct, SilverCategory lookup(SilverProduct@ProductCategoryID == SilverCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCategory
LookupCategory, SilverModel join(SilverProduct@ProductModelID == SilverModel@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinModel
JoinModel select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = SilverProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = SilverProduct@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = SilverProduct@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = SilverProduct@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SilverProduct@ModifiedDate,
		SourceFileName = SilverProduct@SourceFileName,
		DateInserted = SilverProduct@DateInserted,
		ProductCategory = SilverCategory@Name,
		SourceFileName = SilverCategory@SourceFileName,
		ProductModel = SilverModel@Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
GoldDimWatermarks filter(TableName=="DimProduct") ~> FilterDimension
Select keyGenerate(output(ProductKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> GetSurrogateKey
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(TableName),
	LastKey = max(ProductKey)) ~> GetMaxKey
GetSurrogateKey derive(ProductKey = ProductKey+ toInteger(LastKeyCache#outputs()[1].LastKey)) ~> CalculateKey
CalculateKey derive(TableName = "DimProduct") ~> DerivedColumn1
FilterDimension sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> LastKeyCache
GetMaxKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/dimWatermarks',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimWatermarkTarget
CalculateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/DimProduct',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
